doc.field: The Daily Worker and The Daily World Photographs Collection
The Daily Worker and The Daily World Photographs Collection

Contains images of individuals, alone or in groups. Of particular significance are rare photographs of Communist Party of the United States of America (CPUSA) leaders including Elizabeth Gurley Flynn, Gus Hall, Ella Reeve "Mother" Bloor and Henry Winston, as well as important figures in radical politics including Lucy Parsons, Paul Robeson, Thomas Mooney and many others. This series also contains photographs of athletes, musicians, actors, politicians, clergy, and individuals not linked to the CPUSA or the American Left.
The Daily Worker and The Daily World Photographs Collection
